departmentOfEconomicDevelopment.address: Baniyas Tower, Al Falah Street - Fatima bint Mubarak St 6, Abu Dhabi
service.startLogin.description: Apply for an economic record certificate by clicking on start.
service.description.title: Service Description
service.description.body: Through this service, you can obtain a record certificate of the economic Trade Licence, including all licence-related transactions.
service.process.title: Process
service.process.step1.description: Select the licence you require a certificate for.
service.process.step2.description: View and proceed with the payment
service.process.step3.description: View the updates made on the application and download your receipt once the payment is complete.
home.title: Request for Issuing Economic Register Certificate - Commercial
breadcrumb.level0.title: Home
breadcrumb.level1.title: Digital Services
breadcrumb.level2.title: DED Services
selectLicence.intro.title: Select licence
selectLicence.intro.text: Apply for an economic record certificate issued by the Department of Economic Development (DED) for the selected licence number.
errorPage.title: Something Went Wrong
errorPage.text: An error occurred while trying to complete your request. Please try again later.
successPage.text: Congratulations! Your payment was successful and your economic record certificate has been issued. You can download the receipt and the certificate here.
successPage.title: Your economic record certificate has been issued.
payment.subtitle: Payment
payment.description: Please find below your payment summary based on your selection. Please note that this payment can only made with a credit card.
terms.label: I do hereby undertake to comply with all the conditions and requirements stipulated in the laws and resolutions regulating the economic activities related to issuing/renewing and license amendment the commercial licenses and all the data included in the  application. I also undertake not to practice the commercial activity unless after obtaining the approvals of the relevant authorities. The DED has the right to take all legal and administrative actions in case of breach of this Undertaking.

payment.table.price.title: Fee

payment.waitingPage.title: Payment in progress
payment.continueProcessPage.text: Please be patient while we identify your application
payment.continueProcessPage.title: Continue Process
main.title: Pay application fees
